card.name: Distrust in banks
card.info: Customers are more likely to pay by cash

card.name: Anti tolerance
card.info: People lose their temper much faster

card.name: Dyslexia
card.info: All buttons on the numpad are mixed up

card.name: Fragile technology
card.info: The probability of crashing an error in the computer is much higher

card.name: Long check
card.info: The check roll runs out more often

card.name: "And here is the coupon"
card.info: Customers are more likely to ask to scan a coupon

card.name: Do you want a bag?
card.info: Buyers often ask for a bag
